about.summary: A simple, but complete library for managing pidfiles.

name: rb-simple_pid
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "simple_pid" %}
{% set version = "0.2.1" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 340bee3e85cb3680251e9c9e0717fd001e88558b0de7cad72ec1efe0064566ef

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE
  summary: A simple, but complete library for managing pidfiles.

  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/watsonian/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/ruby
    - pierrsc
